mapper.select: SELECT A.ProcessID, WorkItemID, UserCode, UserName FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_workitem A LEFT JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_process B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID WHERE B.FormInstID = #{formInstId} AND A.State = '528' AND A.Name <> 'preview' ORDER BY A.Created ASC
SELECT ProcessID, WorkItemID, UserCode, UserName FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_workitem WHERE ProcessID = #{processID} AND State = '528' AND Name <> 'preview' ORDER BY Created ASC
